name: Demented (itch)
description:
Demented is a mouse-only side scrolling shooter. Just try to survive as long as you can. There are no winners.

This game is in very early development and as such may have bugs. I work alone on this and will try to fix any as soon as possible. So please bear with me.

All feedback is welcome but remember I owe you nothing. I'll try to respond to as many comments as I can.

Lots of love and hope you enjoy yourselves,

Danny
